p: Identification of the essential oil components was based on the comparison of the standard alkanes (C8â€“C20) from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA) with the retention times and mass spectral data, and computer matching with the NIST 21, NIST 107, and WILEY 229 library by comparing the fragmentation patterns of the mass spectra with those reported in the library [ 29].
